meta.title: Sweden Trail
meta.subtitle: A Boy Scout Adventure
meta.description: My 2-week Boy Scout trip across Sweden

days.realStory: Write your Day 1 story here... What happened when you arrived in Stockholm?
Write your Day 2 story here... Sweden's oldest town, the Viking rune stones...
Write your Day 3 story here... The university city, the cathedral...
Write your Day 4 story here... The old silver mines, deep forests...
Write your Day 5 story here... The meteor crater lake in Dalarna...
Write your Day 6 story here... Gateway to the wilderness...
Write your Day 7 story here... Deep boreal forest, bear country...
Write your Day 8 story here... Sweden's highest waterfall...
Write your Day 9 story here... Mountain village near Norway...
Write your Day 10 story here... Alpine lake surrounded by mountains...
Write your Day 11 story here... Endless lakes and rocky terrain...
Write your Day 12 story here... The fjeld village, crisp mountain air...
Write your Day 13 story here... The legendary mountain station, final push...
Write your Day 14 story here... You made it to the Norwegian border!

memories.title: Example Memory
memories.text: Add your favorite trip memories here. Delete this example and add your own.
